title: TRICK OR TREAT: Auburn Fires Bryan Harsin
description:
Rece Davis and Pete Thamel discuss Auburn relieving Bryan Harsin of his head coaching duties, where fits among great moments in Auburn dysfunction, pervasive issues within the program, how the school treated Harsin during the offseason, an Alabama obsession causing problems, candidates for the job, Rece’s advice for Lane Kiffin, needing a little back-slap to make it on the Plains and which school should send a moving truck to pick up Harsin.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Rece Davis, Pete Thamel
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Rece and Pete react to Auburn firing Bryan Harsin, Auburn's Alabama obsession, candidates for the job and where Harsin should land
